Dialogue: Like to teach those bastards a lesson.

Dialogue: Probably already scared them to death.

Dialogue: You call it, Ike.  What're we gonna do?

Speaker: ike
Dialogue: Gimme that.

Dialogue: That's a hell of a thing for you To say to me.

Dialogue: What the hell're we gonna do?

Dialogue: You'll never make that stick.

Dialogue: Virge, that's a misdemeanor. Speaker: virgil
Dialogue: No, damn it, it's wrong, they're Breakin' the law.

Speaker: wyatt
Dialogue: All right, Virge, your call.  But Give Doc the shotgun.  They'll be Less apt to get nervy if they see Him on the street howitzer.

Speaker: wyatt
Dialogue: Well... Come on, boys.

Dialogue: They're on their way over here.

Dialogue: There they go.  Look kinda like preachers.

Speaker: vermillion
Dialogue: Yeah.  Or undertakers.

Dialogue: Virge, you're makin' the arrest. You make contact, I'll back you Up.  Morgan'll back me up, Doc'll Keep an eye out for trouble.  And Keep your hands on your guns. They even look like they're gonna Start something, buffalo 'em. Right over the head.

Dialogue: Wyatt, I know what I'm doin'.

Dialogue: Look at 'em all.  They love it. How in the hell'd we get Ourselves into this?

Dialogue: You don't have to worry about a Thing.  I just went down there and Disarmed them.

Dialogue: You did?  Great, thanks.  Come on, boys.

Dialogue: Oh, great.  Disarmed my ass...

Dialogue: We've come to arrest you.  Throw Up your arms!

Speaker: virgil
Dialogue: Hold!  I don't want that!

Speaker: wyatt
Dialogue: Oh, my God...

Dialogue: No, no, please!  I don't have a gun!

Dialogue: This fight's commenced.  Get to Fightin' or get away!

Dialogue: I'm hit.

Dialogue: Behind us!

Dialogue: Come on!

Dialogue: I got you now, you son of a bitch!

Dialogue: You're a daisy if you do!

Dialogue: How you doin', boy?

Dialogue: Fine.  Better.

Dialogue: Mattie.  What about this?

Dialogue: All they ever did was make fun of him.

Dialogue: I don't understand.

Dialogue: How much you wanna bet?

Dialogue: You're on.

Dialogue: No, no!  Get the doctor!  Jesus Christ!

Dialogue: Oh, no, get her out of her!  Jesus!

Dialogue: Somebody shut that dog up!

Dialogue: You were right, Wyatt.  They got Me good.  Don't let 'em get you Too.

Dialogue: Will somebody get the damn dog out-

Dialogue: Remember about the light you're Supposed to see when you're dyin'?

Dialogue: Easy Morg, don't think about that now.

Dialogue: Isn't true.  I can't see a damn thing.

Dialogue: Morgan?  Morgan!

Dialogue: Wyatt...

Dialogue: If the Lord is my friend.

Dialogue: Are you out of your mind?  What on Earth'd make us-

Dialogue: I'll pay you 500 each in advance And I'll mount you on those.

Dialogue: 500... Year's wages.  And I never even saw a horse like that.

Dialogue: You crazy?  It can't be done.

Dialogue: Doc...

Dialogue: I'm no doctor but he looks pretty bad.

Dialogue: Where're you going?  Get back here!

Dialogue: So what does he want?

Dialogue: What does he want?  He wants revenge.

Dialogue: I'm sorry.  I'm sorry, Wyatt.  God, I'm so sorry.

Dialogue: That's all right, Doc.  Don't worry.

Dialogue: What're you doin' here?

Dialogue: I'll be here.

Dialogue: Oh Johnny.  You're no daisy, no Daisy at all.

Dialogue: When will you wake up?  You Wouldn't know a normal life if it Bit you in the ass.
